option.name: DIFF_MODIFIED
option.value: <option name="BACKGROUND" value="<%= ${bg_blue} %>"/> <option name="FOREGROUND" value="<%= ${bg1} %>"/> <option name="ERROR_STRIPE_COLOR" value="<%= ${bg_blue} %>"/>

option.name: DIFF_CONFLICT
option.value: <option name="BACKGROUND" value="<%= ${bg_red} %>"/> <option name="FOREGROUND" value="<%= ${bg1} %>"/> <option name="ERROR_STRIPE_COLOR" value="<%= ${red} %>"/>

option.name: DIFF_DELETED
option.value: <option name="BACKGROUND" value="<%= ${bg_red} %>"/> <option name="FOREGROUND" value="<%= ${bg1} %>"/> <option name="ERROR_STRIPE_COLOR" value="<%= ${bg_red} %>"/>

option.name: DIFF_INSERTED
option.value: <option name="BACKGROUND" value="<%= ${bg_green} %>"/> <option name="FOREGROUND" value="<%= ${bg1} %>"/> <option name="ERROR_STRIPE_COLOR" value="<%= ${bg_green} %>"/>
